configs.name: auth-ind-nbr
configs.description: Number of authorized individuals per entity

configs.name: asp-invitation-expire-after
configs.description: Duration an invitation to an ASP lasts before expiring

configs.name: first-reminder
configs.description: Duration between an initial disclosure request and the 1st automated reminder

configs.name: second-reminder
configs.description: Duration between an initial disclosure request and the second automated reminder

configs.name: delete-exhibit-forms-after
configs.description: Duration exhibit forms, once submitted, can survive in the ETT system before failure to send disclosure request(s) will result in their deletion

configs.name: delete-drafts-after
configs.description: Duration that partially complete exhibit forms can survive in the ETT system before failure to submit them will result in their deletion

configs.name: delete-consenter-after
configs.description: Duration that a consenter can remain in the ETT system unconsented before being deleted

configs.name: stale-ai-vacancy
configs.description: Duration beyond having a registered ASP that an entity can remain without a registered AI for before being terminated

configs.name: stale-asp-vacancy
configs.description: Duration that an entity can remain without a registered ASP for before being terminated

configs.name: consent-expiration
configs.description: Duration an individuals consent is valid for before it automatically expires
